//Generated by BehavEd


task ( "wheel" )
{

	affect ( "doorwheela", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		rotate ( < 0.000 180.000 0.000 >, 1500.000 );
	}


	affect ( "doorwheelb", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{

		task ( "open/close" )
		{
			rotate ( < 0.000 180.000 0.000 >, 1500.000 );
		}

	}

}

dowait ( "wheel" );
use ( "edoor1" );
